game.name: Where Heaven Fell
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An unnamed climber, you search for God in your ascent to the pinnacle of the city in which the remainder of the world resides in. A lone traveler accompanies you in your climb. Dash, jump, and climb your way to ascension in this challenging 2D platformer!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An unnamed climber, you search for God in your ascent to the pinnacle of the city in which the remainder of the world resides in. A lone traveler accompanies you in your climb. Dash, jump, and climb your way to ascension in this challenging 2D platformer!
